website_summaries.verdict: Excellent price point for a wall fan that has a desirable 16-inch diameter.
pros: Fan includes an oscillation feature which can be handy for moving the air around the room
Offers both a rotary knob and a pull cord control
Frame consists of metal, giving the fan a nice level of longevity
Assembly is easier than you may think
cons: May have problems with longevity and build quality

customer_reviews.title: Isn't very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Our tiny cabin gets super hot in the summer, too hot for our AC. We installed this hoping to move the air around closer to the ceiling. The fan hardly does anything. I have a much smaller vortex fan that's about 8x as powerful. Also the blades are flimsy plastic. I probably should have looked at wattages or something before buying. I recommend opting for a better product, even if its a bit more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: hubbyluv

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra few bucks
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bought a similar cheaper model for my sons room and was very unhappy, this fan has been great. Only downside is I wish they did not use a screw in blade cover, makes the cleaning take a little longer. For the reviews complaining about a noise or rattle, if mount is installed correctly simply bend the catch in the back of the fan a little more towards the fan. Will be a little harder to get into wall mount, but will be much tighter and eliminate any unwanted noise.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Richards

customer_reviews.title: This fan blows.
customer_reviews.text: Nice retro styling and this fan really throws a breeze. It does not tilt down below about 45 degrees so you have to allow for some horizontal distance between the fan and where you want to feel the effect. The retro styling is a nice touch an the pull cords really do make a huge difference in the utility of the device.
customer_reviews.author: stpal001

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great quality. HOLMES OSCILLATING WALL FAN.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fan. Works great. 3 settings for varied cooling levels. Mine sits about 8 feet away from me when I'm sitting in bed and level 1 is cool enough at night for me. Levels 2 and 3 are too high with it being so close. But it does depend on how far you'll be sitting from it, what level will feel comfortable for you. It is made of a lightweight plastic overall, but still sturdy with a metal cage. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Siouxzi99

customer_reviews.title: Great fan.
customer_reviews.text: Looked at various models, but chose this one as it had a metal cover and good ratings. Mounted it in my garage and it is doing a great job keep the air moving. Like the variable speeds and controls. Would be nice to have a remote option otherwise very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: hnrs

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy fan with good air flow, a bit loud
customer_reviews.text: It's loud but I appreciate the sound, it's white noise that I enjoy. It helps my kids sleep longer when it drowns out morning noise. If you don't like loud fan noise when you're sleeping, it's not for you. The air flow capacity is excellent, although I have it mounted in a small office so I can't speak to larger rooms. I really like the pull strings for the controls, makes it easy to change speed/oscillation in the dark. If you place it high near the ceiling, you will need an extension cord to reach a floor level plug. Wish the cord was longer, but not a deal breaker because the fan works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: Not even up and running for a full year and it quit working. Should have assumed it was a pos when it came in what looked like a returns box. No packing.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Schramm

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase! You won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so impressed and thankful for this fan! I needed something for my happy place Lanai where my hammock is located! This is perfect! It’s out of the way, it moves air very nicely and it’s so quiet I hardly know it’s there! Great Purchase! UPDATE: It stopped oscillating already!!!! Bummer!!
customer_reviews.author: Petra Sinhold

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough and is quiet
customer_reviews.text: It's quiet, easy to install, but the output even on high is a little low. I got two for our treadmill and elliptical and they work well for that.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Oscillation switch broke after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Oscillation switch broke after 3 months. Moves a lot of air, great value, and oscillation coverage area is wide. Easy to mount. Mostly plastic. Plastic blade are a bit thin which concerns me with durability of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have owned 2 for 3 years now and they are amazing!! Powerful push air and cool room down. I haven’t had any problems with the two I have. About to buy a third one for my bedroom. These are good quality fans for the money as well!
customer_reviews.author: britt

customer_reviews.title: Dream Weaver
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Never knew how bad I wanted this in my life. I always need a fan going while I sleep and at a good white noise level. My partner and I were using a box fan that I kept knocking over in the night (much to his chagrin). Got this bad boy, mounted it to the wall which was extremely easy and covered the wires with white cord holders. It looks great and creates more space in the room. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Matthews

customer_reviews.title: No Air
customer_reviews.text: Had this fan for about a year and am amazed at how little air it produces. It spins fast but nothing happens. Goes well with my standing Holmes fan that abruptly stopped working. Buy another brand that has some pride in what it makes.
customer_reviews.author: Laramie Flick

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic non durable
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Oscillating bracket broke after three weeks. And apparently you can no longer contact or email customer service. Buy something else amazon so t even contact me about refund or replacement
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sechrest

customer_reviews.title: Fan person
customer_reviews.text: This is replacing a hurricane fan purely on looks in my bedroom. It's noise level is in line for a sleeper who can't sleep without one. Functions fine.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Fan died after 2.5 years
customer_reviews.text: This fan worked fine for about 2.5 years, and I had it running pretty consistently. However, the motor on it just died, so now it oscillates but does not blow anything. I feel like something like this should last at least 5 years, not 2.5 years. So I would say it’s not a good product. I guess I should have taken the one year warranty more seriously...
customer_reviews.author: AfterThought

customer_reviews.title: Was not a good product in my experience
customer_reviews.text: This fan worked for about 6 months until it appeared to lock up or try to apin backwards. The threaded cap spun off and the blade went flying. The motor doesn't spin anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool easy to set up!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and very powerful in my bedroom wow amazing deal thanks Amazon🚗😍fast shipping as well 😍
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t move enough air for my preference.
customer_reviews.text: The fan looks good and is easy to mount. As a fan, though, it hardly moves any air. I’ve had it in my greenhouse for about a year. If you want something that really gets air moving this isn’t the buy. If you’re looking for an easily mountable fan that looks decent then this is a good purchase. For my needs, though, it’s just doesn’t have the output I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to setup!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the Kitchen and had it setup in minutes. it was very easy to attach the bracket that hangs the fan on the wall and the pulls work great, the motor is relatively quiet and it really move the air around. I am very happy with the purchase and would this model again.
customer_reviews.author: Bitwave

customer_reviews.title: good fan!!!
customer_reviews.text: I installed it in our commercial kitchen, and it is pretty good. Bring enough winds for all the cooks.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: It's a little noisy when changing directions oscillating. Other than that, it installed very easy and puts out plenty of air.
customer_reviews.author: the moate's

customer_reviews.title: Oscillation doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: The first one I had worked for around 9 months. I bought a new one, it only oscillated for a month. Don’t buy it unless you want it in a fixed position. Still it’s cheap, easy to install, quiet, and puts out a lot of air. They just need to get the oscillation issue fixed.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Mounts easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for gift. Great quality and over a year of use and still going
customer_reviews.author: DeBruler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our front porch/deck
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan! Perfect for front porch sittin in Oklahoma heat. 3 settings, cool, not too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Runk

customer_reviews.title: Good fan for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to mount, cannot mount to wall studs as the bracket is too wide and the drywall anchors they provide are pretty wimpy. Bought some stronger ones from the hardware store and had it on the wall in less than 5 minutes. It's quiet enough for me and moves a pretty significant amount of air. I wish it had a lower setting as even the 1 is pretty strong, but this is pretty minor
customer_reviews.author: SMH

customer_reviews.title: Puts out a nice breeze!
customer_reviews.text: Great little wall fan! Could be a littlt bigger though! A remote would be nice!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Bilbrough

customer_reviews.title: Good fan
customer_reviews.text: Had to do some modification for the location I chose but works beautifully outside on my porch
customer_reviews.author: Chris Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Love these fans
customer_reviews.text: Very good fans , love to have it in my garage
customer_reviews.author: Zahra Rangwala

customer_reviews.title: I have one of these in a 10x12 feed room and one in a 12x12 tac room and they are perfect for those spaces
customer_reviews.text: I have many different fans for different uses around my ranch. Hard to find the right noise to velocity ratio. I have one of these in a 10x12 feed room and one in a 12x12 tac room and they are perfect for those spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: Broken fast
customer_reviews.text: Bought us August 2019. Quit working by mid May 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Payne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fan
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this fan because you could mount it on the wall. Love the fan. Provides the right amount of air movement. Easy to mount on wall.
customer_reviews.author: Christina S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality fan. It has 2 cords for controlling oscillation and speed. It also has a knob to control oscillation and speed. Mounting is easy, but I would recommend the manufacturer install a bottom mount as the fan "floats" on the upper mount and I used double sided 3M tape to lock it in place. This fan is very quiet and works well in our salon.
customer_reviews.author: Xizor

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I own a restaurant. Two of these guys are outside in our patio area and have basically been on for three months. Zero issues. This is a solid product for sure. Will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: FHCIII

customer_reviews.title: blades are plastic... not strong. Not suffice at blowing out air.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty weak fan, the blades are made of cheap plastic that bend. Overall quality feels good except the blades, plastic and bendy, do not push enough air out AT ALL. Got it for use outdoors for my dogs to cool off in the summer, Eh going to take it back apart and send it back.
customer_reviews.author: William Luttrell

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: The fan is junk. 2nd one we have received that will not oscillate. The latest one arrived in a torn up box that was taped back together. Looks like it was previously returned.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Wall mount fan
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my need, in my shed, mounted on one end and covers the whole area, pull cords are just the right length and use
customer_reviews.author: WAYNE WARE

customer_reviews.title: wonderful fan.
customer_reviews.text: I like it save alot of space. And my son have is own fan on the top of ...his bunk bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice fan but the string pull did not work from ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice fan but the string pull did not work from the time we took it out of the box. That was a disappointment but I didn't want to go through the trouble of returning and reordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Worst fan ever
customer_reviews.text: If you want a fan that will break after slight use this is the one for you!!! Don’t buy this fan even if it’s the last fan in the world unless you’re looking for a terrible fan then this is the one fore you!!!
customer_reviews.author: bm1g

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. Easy to install...only took about 10 minutes. Not loud at all and pushes plenty of air. I purchased two and now I'm getting another one for a third room.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P. Wellever

customer_reviews.title: works great outside
customer_reviews.text: i got this outside on my patio and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This Oscillating fan works great. I have it installed on my exterior Tiki Hut and the fan stays on 24/7 with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: James  Selnow

customer_reviews.title: I had no idea what I was getting myself into.
customer_reviews.text: Insane. Literally blew me away. Came off the wall, helicoptered around my room, then, like a carrier pigeon, returned to it’s home on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Go with the bigger one!
customer_reviews.text: I wish we would have gotten a bigger one as this size doesn’t really seem like it blows hard enough to even reach about 6-8 foot out. It osolates very well! And is super easy to turn on and off; looks good too.. just wish it blew more distance.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than 9 months
customer_reviews.text: This fan is garbage. It was purchased on May 1, 2018 and died within 9 months of intermittent use. Will no longer oscillate and the power behind the different speeds (3 speeds) is a quarter what is was.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend. I couldn't return because it was a 30 ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fan for my mother. It died in 2 months. I do not recommend. I couldn't return because it was a 30 days return policy. Awful.
customer_reviews.author: HGP

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The fan is very quiet. I wish it blew harder and the blades were metal instead of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Started out good
customer_reviews.text: Sadly my fan has stopped working after using it only a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Lee

customer_reviews.title: One star
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan in December and with light use it is dead already . Lasted about 5 months , I would not recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The oscillator will break
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan that pushes a lot of air but like many others have said the oscillator will break.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph shafer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible after 3 a month the product stopped pushing air ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible after 3 a month the product stopped pushing air and would just oscillate and eventually just stopped all together. Save your money I can't even find a way to return it! Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: cool cat 88

customer_reviews.title: Weak air movement.
customer_reviews.text: The fan has a decent white noise sound, but we can’t feel the air 10 ft away. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Terina Turner

customer_reviews.title: do not waste ur money js
customer_reviews.text: very weak fan I have a smaller one that works better
customer_reviews.author: Zircon777

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Good air flow on all three speeds and no vibration. Mounted to the wall easily and sturdily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very easy to install. Used it in my travel trailer and looking to get one for the home.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Oscillation of the fan stopped working within a week. Total junk
customer_reviews.author: Brian O.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this fan. After 3 months of ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this fan. After 3 months of daily use it has stopped working. Spend your money somewhere else. And of course it only has a 30 day warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Riley

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for work and it is amazing. Great airflow.
customer_reviews.author: Darthmom

customer_reviews.title: Oscillating function broke in 3 months do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Fan was purchased in May and the oscillating function does not work anymore.

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the boys on top of the bunk beds
customer_reviews.author: J F

customer_reviews.title: Would like to return both
customer_reviews.text: Second1 I bought first one work for 2 days second one worked for 3 hours h o l m es wall fan 16 in piece of crap
customer_reviews.author: allie c.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery and I LOVE the product. Bought a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the strongest fan ever butvit gets he job done on the patio
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Works great. Better than a regular box fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Just stoped working after 2 weeks probably just a bad unit
customer_reviews.author: Christopher fantauzzo

customer_reviews.title: A very good fan.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, moves a good amount of air & quite. I installed it in a bed room. If a ceiling fan is not a option l would recommend this fan to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby S.

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 1 week. Dont waste your money on this fan
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful fan thank you
customer_reviews.text: It is same as shown in picture,beautiful fan thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Yeny Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Good lil fan
customer_reviews.text: Good little fan. Hung it up.outside on the patio. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: BRANDY LYNN NUNES

customer_reviews.title: Great item so far
customer_reviews.text: Great item so far. This is a good way to make the most of a small space. Nice quiet fan.
customer_reviews.author: Sam I am

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: The fan did not last long, it lasted less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Feng

customer_reviews.title: so good. Size & quality just what we expected
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Size & quality just what we expected. Quite and puts out a great breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Ev

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for a few months now and am pleased with its performance. It's relatively quiet and gives plenty of airflow in our small bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: D. Main

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't push much air,after a month the osalating won't stop,it's alittle cheap
customer_reviews.author: mike lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful. I have it mounted three feet from ...
customer_reviews.text: Not powerful. I have it mounted three feet from the foot of my bed 5'6" off the floor and I can't feel it when I'm in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Mino

customer_reviews.title: one star
customer_reviews.text: not what I expected since day one it does not blow any air only on slow.. and you barely feel it. I paid for something that I cant use.
customer_reviews.author: Diana L.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dice d metal y la elise no es d metal
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: The fan is completely useless without all of the parts
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box to put the fan together the Rear Grill Mounting Nut was missing. After going to four hardware stores, 1 of which was a specialty hardware store, Home Depot & Lowes, none of them had the size necessary. The fan is completely useless without all of the parts. It might be a great fan once put together but the quality control of parts will keep me from ever purchasing this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan, Flimsy box!!!
customer_reviews.text: Would like to have given this a 5 stars, but the package arrived looking like it had been sat on by a gorilla. I requested that it be packed in an extra box to help protect the fan but my request went unheeded. Thankfully the fan still works with a bit of excess vibration and noise while it oscillates. Hard to know if that resulted from the gorilla encounter or if it came from Michigan that way. (Come to think of it, Michiganders can be pretty rough!)
customer_reviews.author: Island Time

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, color off a bit
customer_reviews.text: I recently updated my kids rooms and choose decorative light fixtures over the old ceiling fans they had. Still needed air flow, though, but rooms are too small for floor standing fans. Bought these and they're terrific. I did think they were black, but they're closer to a dark gray. That still matched our color scheme, so it was fine. We did choose to use a stronger wall anchor than the one provided. These tilt up and down, and oscillate very widely. Great air flow, and perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: CCM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and effective
customer_reviews.text: Baby on the way and needed to eat the fans off the ground. This has been a perfect replacement. The box came pretty mangled but everything was there and it works great. Doing a DIY air conditioner with a second one I am ordering. Plenty of air movement, good rotation and coverage for a large angle. Super simple to install on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Dawge

customer_reviews.title: Decent fan for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have this mounted in the garage and it moves a decent amount of air. For the price I don't think you can go wrong. Definelty not as good as an expensive commercial fan but for a smaller homeowner garage or room I think it works good. The first one I ordered was missing some pieces but amazon's customer service was excellent and they returned it and shipped a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Cale B.

customer_reviews.title: alright at a cheap price - about a year of run time
customer_reviews.text: It's quiet until it collects enough dust to become unbalanced, then is wobbles a lot and make noise. Over greased - At about 6 months the grease liquified and then migrated out of the pivot, ran down the shell through the base and down my wall. Disassemble cleaned up the mess and my wall. About 10-12 months of constant operation, the fan died while it was running, the oscillation motor was still working. Disassembled again, found fan motor failed with what appears to be an overheat and and short (or short and overheat) Won't get this class a fan again for constant operation use.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Mine broke from being previously damaged before
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and its a powerful little fan. Only con is that the isolating feature only reaches so far, not sharp enough of a turn or cut.update: somehow my fan broke, I hardly ever touch it and I believe I heard it get jammed and snapped a piece off somehow, while I was in another room watching tv. I guess mine was already damaged, I just got it while it was still hanging on by a thread I guess. I'm very dissatisfied with this fan, I've only had it for a abt a 1 month and like I said I never touch it, I leave it on one speed and setting and still somehow managed to snap.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Well built and quite fan guarantee to cool ya down
customer_reviews.text: Auper easy to put together and hang. Fan has some nice weight to it so it feels and looks well made. The fan is super quite, has 3 speeds to choose from with a handy cord for choose speeds. The price was very right and I am very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Rob S.

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: I've had few of these wall mounted fans over the years and this unit was the best by far. Very easy to mount, it has a wire screen, multiple ways to control it with a dial switch or pull cord. The fan is large enough to move plenty of air and the number 2 setting(of 3) keeps our 18x12 'kitchen comfortable. It did have a bit of a squeak for the first day or 2 of operation but once the oscillating mechanism "worn in" it's been whisper quiet.
customer_reviews.author: NCJohn

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far.
customer_reviews.text: This feels heavy, not light plastic. It was simple to assemble, I did it in less than 5 minutes. There are no bells, whistles or apps. If you just want a sturdy fan that hangs on the wall and moves air by 3 different settings, then this is the one you want. The string makes it oscillate, or not. Simple. I'm buying another one for my laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: trid2bnrml

customer_reviews.title: Quietest fan we own..!
customer_reviews.text: We have bought a Few* fans for our house(s) in our lifetime but this one is By Far the Quietest fan, and definitely Moves The Air in our bedroom! Our standup fan makes more ambient noise than this model and with the standup fan Off we can even hear our little mini-fridge when it cycles. Only owned this one for a couple of weeks but I hope this one outlasts the warranty and works forever*!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fan,
customer_reviews.text: I have this fan on the wall in a porch. it has three speed , is not perfectly quiet, but not loud, it oscillates well, and has a good air flow . I would buy this again. Wall mounting is great for kids, and up high, The fan has a pull cord , so I did not have to climb up and adjust the speed.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Archer

customer_reviews.title: The basement stays pretty well temperature controlled but in the summer when we ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to mount in our basement to circulate air. The basement stays pretty well temperature controlled but in the summer when we are down there (we have a family/game room there) we just felt like we needed a little more air movement. This is perfect, not too loud, and rotates to cover the area well. Well worth the purchase, arrived quickly. Well made and sturdy and we don't feel it takes away from the attractiveness of the space.
customer_reviews.author: 1026mom

customer_reviews.title: Be advised--the oscillation feature will break in a year or two...
customer_reviews.text: Although it's cheaply made, it's easy to put together, and is very quiet. It has three speeds, and optional oscillation, as well as several angles, from perpendicular to forty-five degrees downward, and mounts fairly easily. A metal strap screws to the wall, and the fan connects to that. I'm not sure if you'd call that tongue and groove or mortise and tenon. In light of the fact that the oscillator ~will~ break. I've revised my rating. It might be worth the price to have a fan that will probably last through one summer, but I'm not going to recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy K.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet fan and enery effiecient.
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses it all the time. Looks nice, quiet, easy installation. This one allows for up and down direction of the fan plus it is oscillation side to side. 16" is a nice size it covers our 2 stall garage with placement on the center of wall above the work bench.
customer_reviews.author: Iowan

customer_reviews.title: Good Fan, Squeaked while Oscillating
customer_reviews.text: Fan is nice, easy to install and powerful enough. The only thing I didn't like was that it made a significant squeaking noise in the oscillation mode. I tried everything I could think of, even taking the fan apart and lubricating it but the squeak would not go away. It was installed in our HR office so I just took it out and installed it in my garage where I don't care if it squeaks a little.
customer_reviews.author: The Fixer

customer_reviews.title: nice but limited
customer_reviews.text: This was an easy install and looks nice. Fan doesn't move as much air as others. I think it could be improved with better blades. I have another brand that is almost identical to this one and it has much better air movement
customer_reviews.author: happy1

customer_reviews.title: Makes noise when Osilate
customer_reviews.text: The fan looks really nice but when turning to oscillate, it started making a clicking noise. The product is only running for a few hours and just turned it to Oscillatee. Will talk to Amazon to get a replacement. On stationary it works just fine
customer_reviews.author: msk

customer_reviews.title: I like to listen to NPR on the radio and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Moves air efficiently for my 300 square foot garage. I like to listen to NPR on the radio and the noise level of the fan at high is minimal. I have purchased a Homes heater several years prior and it work satisfactory and therefore had no problem purchasing this fan. I was considering a much more expensive Air King that did not oscillate, I am glad I opted for the less expensive Homes fan.
customer_reviews.author: Different Drummer

customer_reviews.title: I love this.
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit loud, and certainly not modern, but I love it's retro controls. The pull strings and heavy "clunk" when turning on and off and changing speeds is very satisfying. It works great, and even the noise is bearable, it's a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Portia Scott

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Okay, Okay, Okay - if you live in FLORIDA its a must have. I have this sweet portable fan in my master bathroom and it is such a delight when I am doing my hair or getting dress in my MBR, so ladies, get it. It is quiet, easy so easy to install and the fan volume of 1 through 3 is enough for us to get dress and do our hair. GET IT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad design and construction
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and both stopped rotating within a few weeks due to weak construction. Pull cords are a joke. currently checking on warranty. Get a better fan
customer_reviews.author: RR

product_meta.title: HOLMES Oscillating Wall-Mountable Fan, 16 Inch (HMF1611A-UM),Black
product_meta.description: Ideal for use in places where floor space is limited, the Holmes Wall-Mountable Fan delivers quiet, efficient cooling over a wide area. This wall fan has a sturdy metal frame and oscillates at a wide angle to provide cooling over a large area. Equipped with a rotary knob, it allows you to personalize your cooling with three speed settings. It also features an integrated pullcord for convenient operation in higher-mounted positions. And thanks to its tilt-adjustable head, this metal wall-mount fan lets you easily change the direction of airflow. It comes with all necessary wall-mount hardware for easy installation.
feature_bullets: Three speed settings, Oscillation for wide area coverage
Rotary knob or pull cord control
